price: তেওঁ ক’লে, ‘আপুনি কেতিয়াও মোৰ লগত ধৈৰ্য ধাৰণ কৰি থাকিব নোৱাৰিব,
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
